rules_text:
At the beginning of each player's upkeep, sacrifice Hayuan, the Misjudged if that player controls a creature with power 2 or less.
When Hayuan dies, create X Idol tokens, where X is the number of creatures you control. [i](They're artifacts with “{1}, Sacrifice this artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
